dct_title_s: Nova totius terrarum orbis geographica ac hydrographica tabula
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Inset maps: the Arctic; the Antarctic. Text on verso: Description de l'univers. From: Le theatre du monde ... / mis en lumiere par Guillaume et Iean Blaeu. Amsterdami : Apud Iohannem Guiljemi Blaeu, 1643-1655. Includes notes, ornamental cartouches and border of figures & vignettes. Historic Maps copy is state 4 as described in: Shirley, R. The mapping of the world.
